colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (DPAL LDAN LHA MO LA BRTEN PA'I GLUD RDZONGS 'DI NI RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM @006A *, ,GZHAG PHAN PA'I PHYIR MA MO GLUD RDZONGS RGYAS PA RNAMS LA CUNG 'DZAD BSDUS, BSDUS PA RNAMS LAS CUNG ZAD MDZAD BSNAN TE, ^ CHOS RJE'I THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN BDAG GIS BSGRIGS PA LAS, ,SPYAN LDAN MKHAS PA RNAMS LA BZOD 'DOR GSOL, ,YI GE PA NI AU LIM CI PI LI GI THU, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL LO, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN 'GRUB BYON,, ,,DGE'O, ,)
